org.apache.ignite.spi.swapspace.file

Class FileSwapSpaceSpi

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.spi.IgniteSpiAdapter
      • org.apache.ignite.spi.swapspace.file.FileSwapSpaceSpi
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IgniteSpi, IgniteSpiManagementMBean, FileSwapSpaceSpiMBean, SwapSpaceSpi

    @IgniteSpiMultipleInstancesSupport(value=true)
public class FileSwapSpaceSpi
extends IgniteSpiAdapter
implements SwapSpaceSpi, FileSwapSpaceSpiMBean
    File-based swap space SPI implementation which holds keys in memory. This SPI is used by default. It is intended for use in cases when value size is bigger than 100 bytes, otherwise it will not have any positive effect.

    NOTE: This SPI does not support swap eviction currently, manual removes needed to reduce disk space consumption.

    Every space has a name and when used in combination with in-memory data grid name and local node ID, space name represents the actual cache name associated with this swap space. Default name is null which is represented by DFLT_SPACE_NAME.

    Configuration

    Mandatory

    This SPI has no mandatory configuration parameters.

    Optional SPI configuration.

    • Base directory path (see setBaseDirectory(String)).
    • Maximum sparsity (see setMaximumSparsity(float)).
    • Write buffer size in bytes (see setWriteBufferSize(int)).
    • Max write queue size in bytes (see setMaxWriteQueueSize(int)).
    • Read stripes number. (see setReadStripesNumber(int)).

    Java Example

    FileSwapSpaceSpi is configured by default and should be explicitly configured only if some SPI configuration parameters need to be overridden. 
     FileSwapSpaceSpi spi = new FileSwapSpaceSpi();

 // Configure root folder path.
 spi.setBaseDirectory("/path/to/swap/folder");

 IgniteConfiguration cfg = new IgniteConfiguration();

 // Override default swap space SPI.
 cfg.setSwapSpaceSpi(spi);

 // Starts grid.
 G.start(cfg);

    Spring Example

    FileSwapSpaceSpi can be configured from Spring XML configuration file: 
     <bean id="grid.cfg" class="org.apache.ignite.configuration.IgniteConfiguration" scope="singleton">
     ...
     <property name="swapSpaceSpi">
         <bean class="org.apache.ignite.spi.swapspace.file.FileSwapSpaceSpi">
             <property name="baseDirectory" value="/path/to/swap/folder"/>
         </bean>
     </property>
     ...
 </bean>


    For information about Spring framework visit www.springframework.org

    See Also:
    SwapSpaceSpi

      • DFLT_BASE_DIR

        public static final String DFLT_BASE_DIR
        Default base directory. Note that this path is relative to IGNITE_HOME/work folder if IGNITE_HOME system or environment variable specified, otherwise it is relative to work folder under system java.io.tmpdir folder.

        IgniteConfiguration.getWorkDirectory(), Constant Field Values

      • setMaximumSparsity

        public void setMaximumSparsity(float maxSparsity)
        Sets maximum sparsity. This property defines maximum acceptable wasted file space to whole file size ratio. When this ratio becomes higher than specified number compacting thread starts working.
        Parameters:
        maxSparsity - Maximum sparsity. Must be between 0 and 1, default is DFLT_MAX_SPARSITY.

      • getWriteBufferSize

        public int getWriteBufferSize()
        Gets write buffer size in bytes.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        Write buffer size in bytes.

      • setWriteBufferSize

        public void setWriteBufferSize(int writeBufSize)
        Sets write buffer size in bytes. Write to disk occurs only when this buffer is full. Default is DFLT_BUF_SIZE.
        Parameters:
        writeBufSize - Write buffer size in bytes.

      • getMaxWriteQueueSize

        public int getMaxWriteQueueSize()
        Gets max write queue size in bytes.
        Specified by:
        getMaxWriteQueueSize in interface FileSwapSpaceSpiMBean
        Returns:
        Max write queue size in bytes.

      • setMaxWriteQueueSize

        public void setMaxWriteQueueSize(int maxWriteQueSize)
        Sets max write queue size in bytes. If there are more values are waiting for being written to disk then specified size, SPI will block on store(String, org.apache.ignite.spi.swapspace.SwapKey, byte[], org.apache.ignite.spi.swapspace.SwapContext) operation. Default is DFLT_QUE_SIZE.
        Parameters:
        maxWriteQueSize - Max write queue size in bytes.

      • getReadStripesNumber

        public int getReadStripesNumber()
        Gets read pool size.
        Specified by:
        getReadStripesNumber in interface FileSwapSpaceSpiMBean
        Returns:
        Read pool size.

      • setReadStripesNumber

        public void setReadStripesNumber(int readStripesNum)
        Sets read stripe size. Defines number of file channels to be used concurrently. Default is equal to number of CPU cores available to this JVM.
        Parameters:
        readStripesNum - Read stripe number.

      • spiStart

        public void spiStart(@Nullable
            String gridName)
              throws IgniteSpiException
        This method is called to start SPI. After this method returns successfully kernel assumes that SPI is fully operational.
        Specified by:
        spiStart in interface IgniteSpi
        Parameters:
        gridName - Name of grid instance this SPI is being started for (null for default grid).
        Throws:
        IgniteSpiException - Throws in case of any error during SPI start.

      • spiStop

        public void spiStop()
             throws IgniteSpiException
        This method is called to stop SPI. After this method returns kernel assumes that this SPI is finished and all resources acquired by it are released.

        Note that this method can be called at any point including during recovery of failed start. It should make no assumptions on what state SPI will be in when this method is called.

        Specified by:
        spiStop in interface IgniteSpi
        Throws:
        IgniteSpiException - Thrown in case of any error during SPI stop.

                          Iterable<SwapKey> keys,

                            throws IgniteSpiException
        Reads stored values as array of bytes by all passed keys from data space with given name. If specified space does not exist this method returns empty map.

        ctx - Swap context.
        Returns:

        remove in interface SwapSpaceSpi
        Parameters:
        spaceName - Space name to remove value from.
        key - Key to remove value in the specified space for.
